definition: mean elevational shift including all butterfly species [m]
number of butterfly species not shifting significantly
number of butterfly species shifting close to significant (0.1 <= p > 0.05)
number of butterfly species shifting significantly (0.05 <= p > 0.01)
number of butterfly species shifting very significantly (0.01 <= p > 0.001)
number of butterfly species shifting highly significantly (0.001 <= p)
mean elevational shift only including butterfly species shifting significantly (p <= 0.05) [m]
